page.title: 19MILDENHALL PAST AND PRESENT
page.content: The{census records}show that most of the jobs in 1881 in Mildenhall were to do with{farming.}Things like plough boys, labourers and shepherds were the most common jobs.Also we noticed that when a man was a labourer his children tended to take up the same occupation. There were also some{craftsmen}such as carpenters, and some servants.Most people worked in the same area where they were born. In contrast, many people in Mildenhall now{travel}away from the village to work.Locally, there are also more varied jobs available.The farm-workers require different skills to work the modern machinery, and there are also other{local industries providing jobs.
